title: Panaracer announces limited-edition pink and blue Gravel King tyres
content:
Panaracer has announced “Pansy” blue and “Flamingo” pink limited edition colour options for its three thread patterns across the popular Gravel King tyre range: the SS, SK, and the Slicks. 

These continue what has now become an annual tradition and utilise the same ZSG compound technology, anti-flat casing, and 120 TPI construction as the standard Gravel Kings. Like all Gravel Kings 32 mm and above, the pink and blue tyres are tubeless-compatible. 

“These limited edition tires have garnered a bit of a cult following in the bike scene, and it’s a fun challenge to come out with something different every year,” said Jeff Zell, Panaracer’s ‘Global Go-To Guy’. “For 2021, we choose Pansy, because it’s a really beautiful and rich color that’s also rather unique, and pink because it has been the number-one requested color by Panaracer fans for a while now.”

The Gravel King colours are available in 700×32 mm and 38 mm, with shipping expected to commence in early-mid June. Customers can sign up for stock notifications on the Gravel King colours at Panaracerusa.com.
author: Ronan Mc Laughlin
